hangle: 그럼 내가 가만히 있을 줄 알았나.
first_translate: did you think I’d just let you go?
idiom_translate: did you think I’d just let you go?
label: did she  think I’d just stand here?
now he’s holding me even tighter…

first_translate: what are you planning to do now?
idiom_translate: what are you planning to do from now on?
label: what do you plan to do next?

first_translate: I guess I should finish the assignment duke isaac gave me first.
idiom_translate: I guess I should finish the homework duke aevery gave me first.
label: I guess I’ll  finish up what the duke assigned me to do.

first_translate: you mean the work around the manor?
idiom_translate: you mean the work at the manor?
label: you mean  the work you’re doing at the estate?

first_translate: you’ve always been like that since we first met.
idiom_translate: you’ve always been like that since we first met.
label: she was like that since the day we first met.

first_translate: you never planned to stay in one place...
idiom_translate: you never planned to stay in one place...
label: even if she didn’t stay long in one place or fully commit herself to someone,

hangle: 온전히 마음을 줄 생각은 없는 주제에 상냥했다.
first_translate: ...or give your heart to anyone, but you were always kind.
idiom_translate: ...or give your heart to anyone, but you were always kind.
label: she was always incredibly kind.

hangle: 어차피 떠날 거면 아벨도 아예 내쳐버리지 그랬어.
first_translate: why didn’t you just push abel away if you were going to leave anyway?
idiom_translate: why didn’t you just cut abel out of your life if you were going to leave anyway?
label: you should’ve left abel as well if you were gonna leave for good.

hangle: 그랬다가는 공작님이 대륙 끝까지 쫓아올 걸?
first_translate: if I did that, duke isaac would have chased me to the ends of the earth.
idiom_translate: if I did that, duke aevery would have chased me to the ends of the earth.
label: he’d chase  me down all the way to the edge of the continent.

hangle: 내가 좀 무른 면이 있다는 걸 부정할 수는 없지만.
first_translate: I guess I can’t deny that I’m a bit soft.
idiom_translate: I can’t deny that I’m a bit soft.
label: I can’t deny that  I do have a bit of a soft side.
that’s the  kind of person you are.

hangle: 난 늘 틈을 파고들어서 지금까지 쭉 곁에 있을 수 있었어.
first_translate: I was able to find a way to stay by your side all this time.
idiom_translate: I was able to find a way to stay by your side all this time.
label: I always  used that side of you to keep you close  to me.

hangle: 넌 내가 이런 생각을 하는 줄은 모르겠지.
first_translate: you probably have no idea I think this way.
idiom_translate: you probably don’t know I think like this.
label: you probably don’t know I feel this way about you.

first_translate: what are you going to do after you finish the work around the manor?
idiom_translate: what are you going to do after you finish the work at the manor?
label: what are you going to do after you finish the duke’s work?

first_translate: I’m going to buy a house.
idiom_translate: I’m going to buy a house.
label: I’m going to buy a house.

first_translate: I was thinking of moving to the countryside,
idiom_translate: I was thinking of going to the countryside,
label: I thought about finding a place in the countryside,

first_translate: but I think it might be more inconvenient than I thought.
idiom_translate: but I think it’ll be more inconvenient than I thought.
label: but it might be more complicated than I thought.

hangle: 그냥 좀 조용한 외곽 쪽의 집을―
first_translate: so I’m thinking of buying a house in a quiet--
idiom_translate: so I’m thinking of getting a house in a quiet--
label: maybe I’ll  get someplace quite on the outer--

first_translate: I have something to tell you.
label: I have something to tell you.

first_translate: do you remember what you said to me before?
idiom_translate: do you remember what you said to me before?
label: do you remember what you told me?

first_translate: what I said to you before?
idiom_translate: what I said to you before?
label: uhh, what I did I tell you?

first_translate: you said if I ever needed help,
idiom_translate: you said if I ever needed help,
label: you said  you’d always be there for me…

first_translate: I think now is the time.
idiom_translate: I think now is the time.
label: I think that time has come.

first_translate: isn’t your life going smoothly now?
idiom_translate: isn’t your life a smooth road ahead now?
label: you’re set for life.

first_translate: I confessed to fiona about my birth.
idiom_translate: I confessed my birth secret to fiona.
label: I told fiona  the truth behind my birth.

first_translate: I told her I was of imperial blood,
idiom_translate: I told her I was of imperial blood,
label: I told her that I’m part of the imperial bloodline…

first_translate: and that’s why my mother and I lived in hiding.
idiom_translate: and that was why my mother and I lived in hiding.
label: …and that because of it,  I had to live in hiding with my mother.

first_translate: I also told her my mother died trying to protect me.
idiom_translate: I also told her my mother died trying to protect me.
label: I also told her how my mother died trying to save me.

hangle: 어머니를 죽인 자들을 용서 할 수 없어.
label: …forgive  the bastards that killed my mother.
I know  you’ll be happy someday.
and I do care about you.

hangle: 피오나는 그 모든 파괴적인 감정을 옅게 한다.
first_translate: fiona makes all those destructive emotions fade away.
idiom_translate: fiona makes all those destructive emotions fade away.
label: all these destructive emotions within me subside when fiona is around.

hangle: 피오나가 없어지면 내가 과연 계속 평온할 수 있을까?
first_translate: if she disappears, will I be able to stay calm?
idiom_translate: will I be able to stay calm if fiona disappears?
label: would I ever  be able to live in peace without fiona?

hangle: 피오나, 난 지금 타지에 혼자 와 있어.
first_translate: fiona, I’m in a foreign land all by myself.
idiom_translate: fiona, I’m in a foreign land all by myself.
label: fiona,  I’m alone in a foreign land.
I have enemies on all sides.

hangle: 오랜 친구가 곁에 있길 원하는 게 당연한 것 아냐?
first_translate: isn’t it natural for me to want an old friend by my side?
idiom_translate: isn’t it natural for me to want my old friend by my side?
label: can’t you  see that I want to have an old friend by my side?

hangle: 너 진짜로 내가 아벨한테 정신적인 위안을 받을 거라 생각하는 건 아니지?
first_translate: you don’t really think I’ll find any comfort in abel, do you?
idiom_translate: you don’t really think I’ll get any emotional comfort from abel, do you?
label: you really  think abel will lend me emotional support?

first_translate: come to me, my beloved student...!
idiom_translate: come to me, my beloved student...!
label: come to me,  my beloved pupil!

first_translate: wow, that’s so weird, even just thinking about it.
idiom_translate: wow, that’s so weird to even imagine.
label: uhh... yes, highly unlikely.

first_translate: I forgot about the female lead.
label: there’s the female lead.

hangle: 이제 곧 예쁘고 상냥한 운명의 소녀를 만날 수도 있잖아.
first_translate: you might meet a pretty and kind girl who’s your destined partner soon.
idiom_translate: you might meet a pretty and kind girl who’s your destined partner.
label: maybe you’ll  meet a pretty and sweet girl here soon... the girl  of your destiny, perhaps?

hangle: 네 입장에서는 이제 내가 귀찮을 수도 있겠지.
first_translate: I guess I could be a bother to you now.
idiom_translate: I guess I could be a bother to you now.
label: I can see why  you might see me as a nuisance.

first_translate: most people thought of me that way.
idiom_translate: most people thought of me that way.
label: that’s how  most people see me anyway.

hangle: 아무래도 내가 무리한 부탁을 했나 보네.
first_translate: I guess I was asking for too much.
idiom_translate: I guess I was asking for too much.
label: I guess I was asking for too much.

first_translate: I think I hurt his feelings!!
label: I think I hurt his feelings!!

hangle: 시그렌은 이제 갓 고등학교를 졸업한 나이나 마찬가지인데?
first_translate: siegren is basically the same age as a high school graduate.
idiom_translate: siegren is basically a high school graduate.
label: siegren is  pretty much  the same age  as a recently graduated high school senior by now.
as long as I can be of some help.

hangle: 그래, 난 딱히 손해 볼 것도 없…없을테니까?
first_translate: yeah, I guess it won’t do me any harm...!
idiom_translate: yeah, it’s not like I have anything to lose...
label: yes, what do  I have to lose anyway?

first_translate: and you still care about me.
idiom_translate: and you still care about me.
label: I knew it. she still cares.

hangle: 아는 사람이 남아 줘서 안심이 되나 봐.
first_translate: I guess he’s glad to have someone he knows stay with him.
idiom_translate: I guess he’s relieved that someone he knows will stay.
label: he should  feel better having someone he knows by  his side.
a time of peace continued for some time.

first_translate: and soon, the day of the imperial ball...
idiom_translate: and soon, it was time for the imperial ball,
label: finally,  we are at  the starting point of the original novel.

first_translate: ...and the beginning of the original story arrived.
idiom_translate: the start of the original story.
label: the imperial ball was approaching.

first_translate: abel says we should start heading down.
idiom_translate: abel says we should get going.
label: abel says  we should get going soon.

first_translate: I didn’t realize it was already time.
label: it’s already time to go, is it?

first_translate: tell him I’ll be right down.
idiom_translate: tell him I’ll be right down.
label: tell him  I’ll be right down.
